oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Shorty Thompson Show
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: RadiOzark transcription The Shorty Thompson Show, sponsored by Ford tractors. Featuring Shorty Thompson, the Saddle-Rockin' Rhythm Boys, Penny Nichols, and the Matthews Quartet including 'Bob' and 'Slim'. Circa early 1950s.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Shorty Thompson; Saddle-Rockin' Rhythm Boys; Matthews Quartet; Penny Nichols
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Announcer opening statement -- Opening statement (Shorty Thompson) -- The Timber Trail (Shorty Thompson, Matthews Quartet) -- Shorty Thompson talks -- Montana Moon (Shorty Thompson) -- Ford Tractor commercial -- Draggin' The Bow -- Shorty Thompson talks -- Home On The Range (Shorty Thompson) -- Shorty Thompson introduces Penny Nichols -- Montana Plains (Penny Nichols) -- Shorty Thompson introduces the Matthews Quartet -- Well I'm Going (Matthews Quartet) -- Ford Tractor commercial -- Blue Shadows On The Trail (Shorty Thompson) -- Closing statement (Shorty Thompson) -- Theme -- Announcer closing statement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Shorty Thompson show (Radio program); Thompson, Shorty; Nichols, Penny
